LanguageData.DryadBondedAnimalDied.stages.0.label: bonded animal {0} died
LanguageData.DryadPawnWithBadOpinionDied.stages.0.des: Atlest you can be of use now.
LanguageData.DryadMySonDied.stages.0.label: my son {0} died
LanguageData.DryadMySonDied.stages.0.description: To the soil our little bud.

LanguageData.DryadMyDaughterDied.stages.0.description: To the soil our little bud.

LanguageData.DryadMyLoverDied.stages.0.label: my lover {0} died
LanguageData.DryadMyLoverDied.stages.0.description: The bud never got to bloom.
LanguageData.DryadMyBrotherDied.stages.0.label: my brother {0} died
LanguageData.DryadMyBrotherDied.stages.0.description: Back to once we came root-brother.
LanguageData.DryadMySisterDied.stages.0.label: my sister {0} died
LanguageData.DryadMySisterDied.stages.0.description: Back to once we came root-sister.

LanguageData.DryadMyFatherDied.stages.0.description: Back from to once we came.
LanguageData.DryadMyMotherDied.stages.0.label: my mother {0} died
LanguageData.DryadMyMotherDied.stages.0.description: Back from to once we came.
LanguageData.DryadMyNieceDied.stages.0.label: my niece {0} died
LanguageData.DryadMyNephewDied.stages.0.label: my nephew {0} died
LanguageData.DryadMyHalfSiblingDied.stages.0.label: my half-sibling {0} died
LanguageData.DryadMyHalfSiblingDied.stages.0.descript: We hailed from the same root.
LanguageData.DryadMyAuntDied.stages.0.label: my aunt {0} died
LanguageData.DryadMyUncleDied.stages.0.label: my uncle {0} died
LanguageData.DryadMyGrandparentDied.stages.0.label: my grandparent {0} died

LanguageData.DryadMyKinDied.stages.0.label: my kin {0} died
LanguageData.DryadGotMarried.stages.0.label: got married to {0}
LanguageData.DryadGotMarried.stages.0.description: A curious thing this is, pleasant if anything.
LanguageData.DryadAttendedWedding.stages.0.label: attended wedding
LanguageData.DryadAttendedParty.stages.0.label: attended party
LanguageData.DryadAttendedParty.stages.0.description: We used to have our own kind of gatherings.
LanguageData.DryadKnowPrisonerSold.stages.0.label: a prisoner was sold
LanguageData.DryadKnowPrisonerSold.stages.0.descripti: We don't like this, cruel man.
LanguageData.DryadMyOrganHarvested.stages.0.label: my organ harvested
LanguageData.DryadMyOrganHarvested.stages.0.descripti: They are tearing ous apart, nipping our buds.
LanguageData.DryadWasImprisoned.stages.0.label: was imprisoned
LanguageData.DryadWasImprisoned.stages.0.description: They kept enclosed, away from the rest.
LanguageData.DryadNuzzled.stages.0.label: nuzzled
LanguageData.DryadKnowBuriedInSarcophagus.stages.0.de: They are ruining it. Just wasting away, blocked from the rest.
LanguageData.DryadSoakingWet.stages.0.label: soaking wet
LanguageData.DryadWitnessedDeathAlly.stages.0.label: witnessed ally's death
LanguageData.DryadWitnessedDeathAlly.stages.0.descrip: One of our joined the soil.
LanguageData.DryadWitnessedDeathFamily.stages.0.label: witnessed family member's death
LanguageData.DryadDefeatedHostileFactionLeader.stages: We are not the prey here.
LanguageData.DryadColonistBanished.stages.0.label: colonist banished
LanguageData.DryadColonistBanished.stages.0.descripti: There's not enough for all here.
LanguageData.DryadColonistBanishedToDie.stages.0.desc: A waste, they be dead out there. We could have used the mulch atlest.
LanguageData.DryadPrisonerBanishedToDie.stages.0.desc: We could have used the mulch.
LanguageData.DryadBondedAnimalBanished.stages.0.label: bonded animal {0} banished
LanguageData.DryadBondedAnimalBanished.stages.0.descr: What evil could this creature have done.
LanguageData.DryadRescuedRelative.stages.0.label: rescued {0}
LanguageData.DryadRescued.stages.0.label: rescued
LanguageData.DryadRescued.stages.0.description: We will stick around for a while longer.
LanguageData.DryadSleptInBedroom.stages.0.label: awful bedroom
LanguageData.DryadSleptInBedroom.stages.0.description: We don't want to sleep like this.
LanguageData.DryadSleptInBedroom.stages.3.label: decent bedroom
LanguageData.DryadSleptInBedroom.stages.3.description: We don't want to sleep like this.
LanguageData.DryadSleptInBedroom.stages.4.label: slightly impressive bedroom
LanguageData.DryadSleptInBedroom.stages.4.description: We don't want to sleep like this. It's getting to clutterd.
LanguageData.DryadSleptInBedroom.stages.5.label: impressive bedroom
LanguageData.DryadSleptInBedroom.stages.5.description: We don't want to sleep like this. Let us rest elsewhere.
LanguageData.DryadSleptInBedroom.stages.6.label: very impressive bedroom
LanguageData.DryadSleptInBedroom.stages.6.description: We don't want to sleep like this. Let us rest elsewhere.
LanguageData.DryadSleptInBedroom.stages.7.label: extremely impressive bedroom
LanguageData.DryadSleptInBedroom.stages.7.description: We don't want to sleep like this. Let us rest elsewhere.
LanguageData.DryadSleptInBedroom.stages.8.label: unbelievably impressive bedroom
LanguageData.DryadSleptInBedroom.stages.8.description: No! Clear it up, let us rest elsewhere.
LanguageData.DryadSleptInBedroom.stages.9.label: wondrously impressive bedroom
LanguageData.DryadSleptInBedroom.stages.9.description: No! Clear it up, let us rest elsewhere.
LanguageData.DryadSleptInBarracks.stages.0.label: awful barrack
LanguageData.DryadSleptInBarracks.stages.0.descriptio: Cramped together in a confined place.
LanguageData.DryadSleptInBarracks.stages.1.label: dull barrack
LanguageData.DryadSleptInBarracks.stages.2.label: mediocre barrack
LanguageData.DryadSleptInBarracks.stages.3.label: decent barrack
LanguageData.DryadSleptInBarracks.stages.3.descriptio: Let us sleep elsewhere, there's to much stuff.
LanguageData.DryadSleptInBarracks.stages.4.label: slightly impressive barrack
LanguageData.DryadSleptInBarracks.stages.4.descriptio: We can't take this. Let us rest elsewhere.

LanguageData.DryadSleptInBarracks.stages.5.descriptio: We can't take this. Let us rest elsewhere.

LanguageData.DryadSleptInBarracks.stages.6.descriptio: No! We can't take this. Let us rest elsewhere.

LanguageData.DryadSleptInBarracks.stages.9.descriptio: No! We can't take this. Let us rest elsewhere.
LanguageData.DryadInsultedMood.stages.0.label: insulted
LanguageData.DryadInsultedMood.stages.0.description: Such thing to come out of a mouth.

LanguageData.DryadSoldMyBondedAnimal.stages.0.label: bonded animal sold
LanguageData.DryadRebuffedMyRomanceAttemptMood.stages: Was there no flowers between us?
LanguageData.DryadFailedRomanceAttemptOnMeLowOpinionM: What do you see between us?
LanguageData.DryadBrokeUpWithMeMood.stages.0.label: broken up with by {0}
LanguageData.DryadBrokeUpWithMeMood.stages.0.descript: We never saw that the flower had wilted.
LanguageData.DryadCheatedOnMe.stages.0.label: cheated on me
LanguageData.DryadCheatedOnMeMood.stages.0.label: cheated on by {0}
LanguageData.DryadCheatedOnMeMood.stages.0.descriptio: What a wierd feeling... We don't like it.
LanguageData.DryadDivorcedMe.stages.0.label: divorced me
LanguageData.DryadGotSomeLovin.stages.0.label: got some lovin’
LanguageData.DryadSleptOutside.stages.0.label: slept outside
LanguageData.DryadSleptOnGround.stages.0.label: slept on ground
LanguageData.DryadSleptOnGround.stages.0.description: We got to sleep close to the ground.
LanguageData.DryadFamilyLost.stages.0.label: member {0} lost
LanguageData.DryadFamilyLost.stages.0.description: We will miss them. We hope they will get back to us someday.
